    public class B3VisualShapeInformation
extends Struct
implements NativeResource

    Layout

    
 struct b3VisualShapeInformation {
     int m_numVisualShapes;
     struct b3VisualShapeData * m_visualShapeData;
 }

    • Constructor Detail

      • B3VisualShapeInformation

        public B3VisualShapeInformation​(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a B3VisualShapeInformation instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
